landing.heroTitle: Welcome to TÃ¼rkiye's digital farm economy.
landing.heroSubtitle: Grow animals, cultivate in greenhouses, and sell outputs to the exchange or P2P marketplace. Manage everything with a secure TRY wallet, KYC compliance, and a modern interface.

highlightProduction.title: Realistic production loops
highlightProduction.description: Model animal and crop production with hourly, daily, and monthly ticks. Manage feed shortages and seasonality impacts.

highlightWallet.title: TRY wallet & KYC
highlightWallet.description: Deposit, withdraw, and audit every transaction with compliance logs and KYC-aware restrictions.

highlightAdmin.title: Operator economy controls
highlightAdmin.description: Fine-tune prices, spreads, fees, and risk toggles from an all-in-one admin panel.

help.title: Help Center
help.intro: Browse frequently asked questions and guides to make the most of FarmHub TR.

howWorks.question: How does FarmHub TR work?
howWorks.answer: It simulates a real farm economy. Acquire assets, keep them fed through production ticks, and sell outputs for TRY.

wallet.question: Is the TRY wallet secure?
wallet.answer: Double-entry bookkeeping, audit trails, and compliance controls are enforced. Withdrawals require verified KYC.

production.question: How do production ticks operate?
production.answer: Hourly BullMQ jobs consume feed, generate outputs, and apply maintenance costs across animals and crops.
